Reason: The _journalAgeThreshold configuration determines the age threshold for journal entries in the Prevayler software project. Changing this value can significantly impact system performance as it directly affects the frequency of journal entries being processed and stored. A lower threshold may result in more frequent journal entries and increased memory consumption, while a higher threshold may lead to longer execution times for processing older entries. Therefore, any changes to this configuration can have notable variations in execution time and memory consumption, making it performance-sensitive.
